title: Bits
description: Smallest category of SCSS code. MUST only contain variables, mixins, functions, and placeholders. Variable names MUST be in snake case (eg. `snake_case`). Mixin, function, and placeholder names MUST be in came case (eg. `cameCase`).

sections.title: Colours
description: Part of the vars module. Default colours MUST be defined for default modules to compile correctly. All colours MUST be assigned to variables.

sections.title: Typography
description: Part of the vars module. Element's text properties MUST be set as variables. Other categories' text properties SHOULD be set as variables. Base `font-size` MUST be set to `62.6%` (resets `font-size` to `10px`). A `$global_family` MUST be set to be the primarary typeface.

sections.title: Grid
description: Part of the vars module. Default primary grid set up by `$global_columns` and `$global_gutter`. See `Layouts` for information on rows and spans.

sections.title: Utilities
description: Utils module. MUST only contain mixins, placeholders, and functions. Generic examples below.

sections.title: Sprites
description: Sprites module. Sprite stylesheet MUST NOT be manually changed. It is generated by gulp using `npm run gulp sprite`. See `gulp` section for details.
